Posts.Content: Jan 17, 2008 10:29AM susancosur wrote: My sister-in-law had the same reaction as you on her 2nd Taxotere treatment.  Her onc immediately stopped treatment, wouldn't even entertain trying it again (even with meds) and started from the beginning with AC x4 every 3 weeks, then Taxol plus Herceptin every week for 12 weeks.  She was given lots of premeds (Benedryl, Tagamet, & Decadron) and did just fine, finishing all her treatments on time.  Good luck to you.
Posts.Title: Anyone else allergic to taxotere? peggyc CrystalLocket
